description: React functional component 'UploadDropzone' that provides a drag-and-drop area and file input for uploading files, filtering accepted file types.

methods.name: UploadDropzone
methods.description: React component allowing users to upload files via drag-and-drop or file picker.

methods.name: onFilesSelected
methods.description: Handles file input change and filters files based on extension before passing them to the 'onFiles' callback.
